title: 1 bedroom available in gorgeous 3 bd Brookline apt for 8/1
posting_body: Hey there!
We have one available room in our lovely Brookline apartment ready for an August 1 move in.
About the place:
We live in a 3bed/1bath, second floor apt on a quiet side street in Brookline.
Heat and hot water are included in the rent, and there is coin-op laundry and ample storage space in the basement.
There’s also an extra room in our unit for additional storage or an office space.
Tons of local shops nearby, and easy access to public transit.
We also have a porch!
About us:
Cara, 31 year old educator shaping young minds of children with Autism.
Mostly a homebody, but definitely enjoy quality time with friends.
420 friendly, respectful, and love to laugh.
Stand-up comedy, sci-fi, and womens soccer are my go-to’s.
Melissa, 29 year old social worker, 420 friendly and queer.
Movies, music, art, games, playing with my dog are my typical activities.
Empathy, communication and cultivating silliness are some of my values.
Marshall, 30 year old who works at Party Favors a bakery/ Party Store at Coolidge Corner.
I play guitar, like to hang out and do artsy things.
Homebody mostly when I’m not at work.
Spend days off lounging maybe having an adventure.
Elio, 4 year old well behaved lab/aussie mix.
He enjoys spending time at the local park a stone’s throw away and providing good vibes for the apartment.
Melissa and Marshall are partners.
We all share similar values as roommates, such as open communication, mutual respect and a clean home.
There is a $25 credit check as well as a $250 lease processing fee (but no realtor fee woohoo!).
To move in, it is just first and last.
The lease is for one year.
If this sounds like it would be a good fit, reach out!
We’d love to set up a zoom and hear more about you.
